Starscream

Starscream looks at Reptillica.

"No, not really. Bt you can tell me from in there."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix removes Ramulus' spark. The glowing orb, shining with bright 
light. Brix alomst gets lost in it; could have been staring at it 
forever. He snaps out of it when he remembers it's Ramulus, and 
places it back in his body.

Fliq feels all control of his body come back when Ramulus leaves. He 
looks himself up and down, with his new fuzor form.

"Wow....I guess tyhat TM2 stuff affects the spark in some way. If the 
battles ever stopped, I would study it. But we don't have time. So 
how de we get off this rock?"
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois held Child in his arms.

"No....why did you have to do that? You haven't been trained. You 
have not unlocked your full power. Why do you always put yourself in 
danger."

He continued to keep Child in his arms, and he turned to Windrazor's 
group.

"Go back to the embassy and get the rest of the parts."
______________________________________________________________________
The Trainers/Savage

Prebon was starring at a computer, giving Savage's signs. He studyed 
it carefully.

"The chip has identified a certain bot that Savage truly hates. 
Computer, acces memory file for that bot." A picture comes up.

"Hmmm........ He has the Maximal symbol. What base does he come from?"

The memories come up of Savage's attack on the Ark.

"The Ark! It's here. Amazing. And these Maximals are using it as a 
base. We need to defeat it. Killing must be done. Savage's anger 
towards this bot will serve us well. Men, get ready! In a mega-cycle 
we attack the Ark!"

That bot is in for a lot of trouble. That bot is.....Striker.
